reviews.title: Long Lasting Temperature
reviews.review_text: This set is so amazing. The stainless steel bottle keeps my water so cold that my ice doesn't even melt, and the outside sleeve on the bottle means it won't sweat! I prefer the straw lid, but the other two lids are really functional for drinks other than water. Highly impressed.

reviews.title: 20 oz Ozark Tumbler & Lid Set
reviews.review_text: I received my tumbler in the mail a couple days ago. I noticed how nice and sturdy it looked. After washing it out I put my water in it's my daily routine. We have a 5 yr old. He is my test study. Used it for about an hour or so and our 5 yr old was eying me to use it. First 5 minutes its on the floor being trampled by our 80 pd dog. About an hour later its outside and had fallen off the steps. Water still cold, straw still working and no leaks. This is my favorite tumbler by far. Its strong enough for our 5 yr old son and our 80 pd dog, and its 2 days later. I expect this tumbler to last a long time and keep my drink cold ! The reusable straw is one of the strongest also.

reviews.title: A versatile & sturdy travel tumbler set.
reviews.review_text: There are lots of travel mugs and tumblers on the marker but the Ozark has a really unique design and comes with a variety of great accessories. This is a great option for using during outdoor activities such as camping or fishing. Likewise it is wonderful for daily use at home or the office.

reviews.title: Tough tumbler
reviews.review_text: My boys and I loved the tumbler!!! It has so many different attachments for either hot or cold drinks. I like the unique design. I like the small indentations on sides of lid for finger grips. We tried it with hot tea. It kept the drink about same temperature as when prepared for over 4 hours. Also when we used ice water it didn't sweat on outside and kept drink very cold for hours.

reviews.title: What a great tumbler!
reviews.review_text: I use mostly tumblers these days for drinking and this one keep my cold drinks cold and I even have ice in my glass after a long night which is not normal for me. I did use it for coffee once and it kept my coffee hot for hours! I really like the inclusion of the 3 different tops/lids. It's actually pretty ingenious to have all 3 options for one tumbler. All in all, not one complaint!

reviews.title: Perfect Set!
reviews.review_text: I love this Ozark Trail Tumbler & Lid Set. It's perfect for every need. It has the straw for at home, has a sealed cover for coffee on the go. It has even a tumbler top with screw on lid. It's great, its metal inside so I do not need to worry about it getting gross if I use things other than water. This is exactly what I was looking for.

reviews.title: Ozark Trail tumbler and lid set
reviews.review_text: I love tumblers. I buy them often because I'm always drinking cold drinks throughout the day and I love having many different tumblers to use. I love this one, with its 3 different lids for whatever you need it for. It's a great size, and color as well.

reviews.title: Tumbler review
reviews.review_text: It's amazing. I've never had a tumbler set before like this one. I love how it came with three different lid options. And when I make coffee or hot coco it keeps it warm for hours. And if put something cold in it. My drink will stay cold for hours as well. Definitely must have

reviews.title: Travel Cup with options
reviews.review_text: My husband and I both love the texture on the outside of the tumbler. My husband when he first saw it thought it was an early Christmas gift for him because it has such a masculine appearance to it. I like all the different lid options for it, but I don't like that it did not come with a case or bag to carry to storage the different lids when you're not using them. I also did not like that I had to read the directions to learn how to open the mug lid or the even after reading the directions I do not know if the mug is dishwasher safe or not. So to be on the safe side I have just been hand washing it. I would not recommend only because it does not give you a travel case for the lid options, because I do like that all the lid options seal properly and it does not spill.

I purchased a set for myself, then one of my daughters seen it and asked for a set and we went to visit my other daughter and she asked where her set ones because her sister had been talking about how great it is. We all agreed that the "hot" lid was designed more difficult than it needed to be (open to far and you're taking the lid off again) and is hard to drink (very large lip) out of so looses a star for that. We all love the lid versatility since all of us are huge water drinkers, my girls love the reusable straw top where I like the bottle option. One cup and 2 lids is all you need for your entire day.

reviews.title: Great Tumbler Set
reviews.review_text: This tumbler is awesome! It holds a good amount of drink it definitely keeps it hot or cold. I use it for cold drinks in the day, one ice cube and it stays cold all day. I use it for tea at night and it really keeps it hot practically the entire night. The bottle lid that comes with it is very handy if you're on the go. This set would be a great purchase.

reviews.title: Ozark Trail Tumbler & Lid Set is great!
reviews.review_text: I love it!! It keeps my drinks cold for hours! I love the top that makes it into a bottle, that's awesome. Everything about the Ozark Trail Tumbler & Lid Set is wonderful. The interchangeable tops are great. It's easy to take care of, just wash with warm soap and water.

reviews.title: Very versatile bottle/tumbler
reviews.review_text: I was very pleased with how cold my water stayed during my 8 hour work shift as a nurse. The screw top is actually my favorite feature. I like the way the tumbler easily turns into a bottle. It's leakproof and shatterproof. This is a really great product

reviews.title: Perfect Gift
reviews.review_text: The Ozark Trail Tumbler and Lid Set makes a perfect gift! I love that it has so many different lid options! I am always looking for specific bottles with specific lid types depending on what I will be using it for. This will allow me to have one cup with a variety of uses!

reviews.title: My new favorite tumbler!
reviews.review_text: I received the ozark trail tumbler and lid set and now it's my favorite!! This tumbler is so versatile. It can have hot coffee or cold tea. The heat stays with the hot coffee and also stays cold with iced tea. The different lids that came with it are also very awesome. Interchangeable types of lids makes this tumbler a dream. I was bragging on this tumbler the very first day I received it. My new favorite!

reviews.title: Best tumbler ever!
reviews.review_text: I love my 20 Oz Ozark Trail Tumbler & Lid Set! I am a coffee drinker but I drink my coffee very slowly. It is usually cold by the time I finish. But not with this tumbler! It keeps my coffee hot for hours. This tumbler is also helping me drink more water. I only drink water when it very cold and I can sip on cold water all day. I would highly recommend this tumbler to everyone!

reviews.title: Love the top options!
reviews.review_text: When I placed a hot beverage in the tumbler, several hours later it was still hot. When I used the tumbler for an iced drink and left it in my car overnight, it still had ice in it the next morning although it was a cool night. When I used the tumbler for an iced drink on a hot day, the ice melted within a couple of hours. I really like the wide top accessory you can use to pour a soup or stew from the tumbler. I also like the screw top and how it allow you to drink you beveridge with using a stray. Overall I was pleased with the variety of ways I could use this tumbler for hot or cold.

reviews.title: wish there were color options
reviews.review_text: Bought these for riding the side by side. originally had my brumate which I love! but it was getting ruined so I set foot to look for a decent substitute... looking at walmart I found these, they looked textured and was neat it had 3 options to use it: including a straw, bottle top or coffee mug type. it seemed to be pretty well made. so after using it about a week riding off and on it still stands up and hasn't been ruined by the cup holder in the side by side! overalls was a great purchase and I am glad I took a chance on these! only thing I wish was there were different colors to separate my husbands and mine from each other!

reviews.title: My new favorite tumbler set!
reviews.review_text: I primarily used this tumbler as my travel coffee mug and I love it! It keeps hot drinks hot for a long time! The bottle lid is very nice for when I go hiking and need to keep my water cold! The exterior of the tumbler is highly textured making it easy to grip in the event that it gets wet. My one minor gripe would be that the coffee lid is not the easiest to wash. I have been using baby bottle nipple brushes to clean all of the groves in the underside of it. Otherwise, this is my new favorite travel mug!

reviews.title: Excellent product
reviews.review_text: The 3 -in- 1 Tumbler set worked great! The coffee lid was excellent. Kept my coffee hot forever! The straw lid worked great for my ice tea, and the bottle top lid was great for when I was shooting baskets in the driveway. I would highly recommend this product for anyone and everyone.

reviews.title: great for the weekend adult beverage!
reviews.review_text: It was a little confusing to figure that it was a screw top as my other Ozark are gasket seal top and the directions were hidden inside the sealed top. Also not sure about the bottle top as its to small for a beer unless you pour the beer inside prior to putting the bottle top on and even then its not really full. Overall I love Ozark and like the texture of this one. The screw top also feels more secure and great for activities and keeping bugs out. Ozark also keeps my drinks cold for a good long period of time.

reviews.title: 20 ounce Ozark Trail Tumbler & Lid Set
reviews.review_text: The tumbler is the right size, well insulated, and the outside texture is great for durability and gripping. The locking lid is difficult to open, and it is awkward to drink from. I will not use it. The bottle lid is nice and easy to use, but the hole is too large for drinking. The straw lid has an oversize hole for the straw, thus possible large leakage if overturned.

reviews.title: I Love It
reviews.review_text: I'll just be honest, I love this tumbler. I love the fact that it comes with a slim lid w/straw, a lid for hot liquids, and my favorite is the accessory/lid that turns the tumbler into a bottle, it actually extends the tumbler with a plastic piece shaped like the top of a bottle and then has a stainless lid that goes onto that. I use the tumbler in bottle form most often, I even fill it up with ice water every night and keep it beside my bed in case I need a drink in the middle of the night. In the morning I still have ice in the tumbler. I really like everything about this product, it looks good, it is very functional, the accessories allow it to be used in different and unique ways, etc. Overall, I am very happy with this tumbler set from Ozark Trail.

reviews.title: Great option for everyone!
reviews.review_text: The OzarkTrail 3-IN-1 Tumbler has become my favorite cold and hot drinking cup. I can take my coffee on my way to work as well as drinking my favorite cold drink during the day, all I have to do is switch the lid and use it with the straw. My daughter loves the option of the tumbler because she brings cold water to school, it was easy for her to add the ice and then screw the lid to add water. I like that it's leakproof and shatterproof, perfect for my daughter to bring it to school. This is a great option for everyone because all you need is just one cup that does it all! I highly recommend it!

reviews.title: Not for Me
reviews.review_text: I gave this tumbler to my husband to try. He has been using it around the house and at work. This is a good tumbler because it is a nice dark color and it is textured for grip. I like that it fits into a cupholder securely. The coffee lid is nice and easy to use. This tumbler doesn't leak which is very important to me. It is well insulated and kept my drink cold for most of the day. The only thing that I don't like about this product is the straw lid and the lid that is supposed to convert this tumbler to a bottle. The bottle lid is too large and it is awkward to drink out of.

reviews.title: I love the product
reviews.review_text: I like the color , the versatility. i love i can use it for hot or cold drinks. I love the differents lids. I love the one that looks like a bottle lid, the one for hot beverage(i love it).

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love my Ozark Trail Tumbler and Lid set, 20oz. It keeps my cold beverages cold and my coffee hot. I switch out the kids to my preference for the day. The exterior texture keeps my hands from slipping as well.

reviews.title: Great Product!
reviews.review_text: The Ozark Trail Tumbler & Lid set is great! The different tops allow you to customize it to your activity. My water stayed cold for hours. This is a great product!

reviews.title: Great cup
reviews.review_text: I love how this product is for hot or cold! It came with 3 different kinds of lids one was a bottle lid, another was a straw lid and another for your hot drinks. I would recommend this product to my friends.

reviews.title: Great cup
reviews.review_text: This is by far my favorite tumbler. I absolutely love the design, the size and the different ways I can use it. I will definitely be putting this cup to a lot of use.

reviews.title: Adaptable cup
reviews.review_text: This tumbler set is pretty much all you need . The different lid attachments make it be the tumbler you need ( water bottle, iced drink or coffee ) I am very interested to see if it will be available at larger sizes and different colors .

reviews.title: Great tumbler!
reviews.review_text: This tumbler is great! It's very sturdy, but not overly heavy. The three different lids it comes with is what does it for me. You can literally use this tumbler for anything by just switching a top! Definitely would recommend.

reviews.title: Must buy item!
reviews.review_text: OK folks this product is next level great! Not only does it keep your drinks cold the lids actually work like they are supposed to. Nothing leaks or drips its fantastic! I love the lid for a bottle to be kept in the tumbler what a great idea!

reviews.title: Great tumbler
reviews.review_text: The Ozark Trail Tumbler and lid set is really great. You can drink out of it with a straw a no spill lid or a water bottle lid. It does not leak. My ice stayed frozen all day. Drinks stayed cold and or hot. Amazing

reviews.title: A new cup
reviews.review_text: The ozark trail tumbler and lid set . I want to buy one for all my family and friends for Christmas they all would love on so bad. It's easy to use and wish too. You don't spill it on you at all.

reviews.title: Great tumbler
reviews.review_text: This cup is great. It keeps my cold drinks cold and my hot drinks hot for a long time. I love the extra attachments that come with it. In my opinion it is as good as the very expensive brand.

reviews.title: Nice and Warm
reviews.review_text: I love the different options with this tumbler. I have used this for keeping coffee and tea warm in the mornings for bus drop off and after work for going on outdoor walks. Keeps beverages warm for a long time.

reviews.title: Innovative design but not for my needs
reviews.review_text: The uses of this product are somewhat limited. You're discouraged from using it for any food and beverages that include sugar, dairy, etc. So, I guess it's mostly just for water. I appreciate the ability to convert it into a bottle and a tumbler with a lid/straw combo but there's no option to simply sip coffee (or any hot or cold beverage) from the tumbler.

reviews.title: Great Tumbler
reviews.review_text: This is absolutely perfect for my husband to bring to work with him! The 3 in 1 is a great feature and I love that it's outdoors!

reviews.title: Loving ittt must try
reviews.review_text: It is best for work I can take anything in it if I take juice it stays cold ,if I take coffee it stays hot and the straw can be cleaned so easily

reviews.title: Good and very useful
reviews.review_text: Its a very nice and good quality tumbler set with all the required accessories along with it. Easy to use and carry

reviews.title: Happy with my tumbler
reviews.review_text: I like this tumbler cause I can have my coffe hot or my beer cold is easy to change the lids and to wash it

reviews.title: Forever warm!
reviews.review_text: Sturdy well made and keeps drinks at their optimal temp forever! I was shocked by how well the insulation works, my drink was warm hours later!

reviews.title: Nice tumbler set
reviews.review_text: I feel that it works just as good as my Yetis. i would definatley buy it and even give as gifts. My son even said that it was good.

reviews.title: Amazing product
reviews.review_text: I loved this set love love love i really recommended i had to go buy one for my hubby cause he wanted to keep mine lol thanks hometesters club.

reviews.title: Great product, very happy
reviews.review_text: This tumbler set is a great product. Easy to clean, has plenty of room and I like that it can have two different tops. I give it 5 stars.

reviews.title: Absolutely worth it
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the water bottle part of the cup. I used it on my 7 mile hike and it stay cold the whole time unlike my other cups

reviews.title: Great!!
reviews.review_text: I love this set! It's super easy to use and works great for all types of beverages both inside and outside the house

reviews.title: Traveling companion
reviews.review_text: I liked the size of the container. Usually they are much smaller and I have never seen the the 2 lids and the bottle pourer before

reviews.title: amazing product a must buy
reviews.review_text: great tumbler very comfortable to carry love all the options for drinking fits all my hot and cold drinking needs definitely recommend

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.review_text: I love how it comes with three different lids! The locking lid is a genius idea! And the bottle lid is a definitely a go to! 10 out of 10!
Great insulated cup with 2 different lids. One lid also includes a clear plastic straw for easy drinking, and the other lid has a cap on it for easy screw off/on option. I also bought one as a gift.

reviews.title: Its amazing product
reviews.review_text: Very nice cup love it for weather changes warm up in cold climates

reviews.title: How can you go wrong 3 in 1
reviews.review_text: We love the 3 In 1 factor versatile feature is awesome we highly recommend this product

reviews.title: Love this tumbler!
reviews.review_text: I love this tumbler! Its so stylish and its perfect for using ice to keep drinks cool!

reviews.title: The Perfect water Bottle
reviews.review_text: Great Set. perfect for Gift giving or for yourself. everything that you need to keep hydrated.

reviews.title: Tumbler its good
reviews.review_text: It doesn't keep ice for very long like some other tumblers

reviews.title: Cold drinks!
reviews.review_text: It keeps my cold for hours even when left in the car

reviews.title: Ozark tumbler
reviews.review_text: Great cup and so versatile! Definitely would have wanted if I saw it on the shelf.

reviews.title: Good for camping
reviews.review_text: I love this it's not bulky. It's decently sized and does an amazing job keeping my drinks cold while camping.

reviews.title: Great tumbler
reviews.review_text: I love this tumbler set. The three lids that come with it are great. I like that I can have a lid to switch up so depending on what I'm drinking it makes it more confusing. I like how well it keeps mu drink hot for hours and does the same thing when I put something cold . The cup is super durable so even if you drop it you don't have to worry about it breaking .

reviews.title: Ozark Trail is my top choice
reviews.review_text: I have tested several similar tumblers and the Ozark Trail Tumbler has blown them out of the water. This particular tumbler actually keeps liquids hot when you want them hot, and cold when you want them cold. I love the versatility with the top, it allows you to have many uses all in one durable and well designed Tumbler!

reviews.title: Awesome tumbler
reviews.review_text: The tumbler's sleek design not only looks great, but it also fits comfortably in my hand. The double-wall insulation keeps my drinks at the perfect temperature for hours. Plus, the lid seals tightly, preventing any spills while I'm on the go. Overall, this tumbler has exceeded my expectations, and I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a reliable and stylish drink companion.

reviews.title: Keeps drinks cold or hot!!!
reviews.review_text: I purchased the Ozark Trail Tumbler and Lid Set 20 oz. to take my coffee to work. It keeps my coffee hot for hours. I have also used it for ice tea and it keeps cold for hours as well. I like the screw top lid as well. This is a great tumbler.

reviews.title: Tumbler
reviews.review_text: I love this appliance so much that I got to try it first hand. I did not feel comfortable with the price range, but I enjoyed using it on a daily basis. WHat strucked out to me the most was the functions available. Tumbler

reviews.title: Good
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed the Ozark Trail Tumbler & Lid Set on my last trip. I thought I would test it out when we took our kids to the zoo. It was easy to use with no leaks. I will continue using it.

reviews.title: Awesome drink mixer!
reviews.review_text: I used this camping and I mixed my drinks with it. It even comes with a reusable nice straw. It kept my drink very cold for like ten hours overnight there were still ice cubes in it!

reviews.title: Buy it! Worth your money!
reviews.review_text: Bought this product, as well as other products in this same brand for a multi state camping trip over the winter. This set was worth the money by far. I loved how it came with different lids, and the straw. It kept water cold for a long period.

reviews.title: Great for on the go
reviews.review_text: I love this because it is great for on the go. I use it for my cold or iced drinks. I also use this for my hotter drinks in the fall and winter. It is also easy to clean, even the straw!

reviews.title: Great tumbler
reviews.review_text: Great tumbler that keeps beverages warm or cold for hours!! Without the steep price of other tumblers out there this product is exceptional.

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.review_text: This Ozark Trail Tumbler & Lid Set 20 Oz. is very nice to used. It's light and handy. It's easy to clean .

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.review_text: I love this ozark set. It works great with hot and cold beverages. It is very easy to clean and use. Also perfect for camping. Highly recommended

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review_text: This is a must have for work or home as it always keeps my drinks hot and it is easy to use and clean. Highly recommend

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.review_text: Great option for a variety of drink choices when you are on the go. Keeps stuff hot/cold for a very long time and the lid straw are great to have.

reviews.title: OZARK
reviews.review_text: Works great ! Keeps hot beverages hot for a long time.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.review_text: This tumbler is awesome! It holds a good amount of drink it definitely keeps it hot or cold

reviews.title: Love this cup
reviews.review_text: This cup is amazing! The lid locks very well for it. No leaking and the different lid selection.

reviews.title: Awesome product!
reviews.review_text: Awesome product. Keeps beverages hot/cold for hours. Perfect for camping.
